backend/main.mo: Actor module defining storage maps, access control, notification types, and notification CRUD with timestamps and sorting.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and functionality of various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling with light/dark theme variables and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file providing root app mount point and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app setup configuring authentication-aware layout and full TanStack Router route tree.
frontend/src/components/CollectionCommen: Component displaying and creating collection comments with authentication checks, timestamp formatting, and loading states.
frontend/src/components/CollectionPostCa: Displays a collection post with image, caption, author info, likes, and expandable comments, using multiple query hooks.
Renders comments for a post and provides a form for authenticated users to submit new comments.
frontend/src/components/CreatePostCard.t: Provides a dialog for creating a new post with caption and image upload, including preview and upload progress.
Shows a daily prompt selected by day of year with static images and styling.
frontend/src/components/DiscussionCommen: Handles listing and creating comments for a discussion post, with loading skeletons and user profiles.
frontend/src/components/DiscussionPostCa: Displays a discussion post with text, optional image, author info, likes, and expandable comments.
frontend/src/components/EditProfileModal: Modal for editing a user's username and bio, handling form state, validation, and profile update mutation.
frontend/src/components/EventCommentsSec: Displays and posts comments for an event, including authentication checks, timestamps, and loading states.
frontend/src/components/EventPostCard.ts: Card component for an event post showing event details, creator info, image, and a toggleable comments section.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying copyright text and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/GroupCommentsSec: Handles viewing and creating comments on a group post with member checks, timestamp formatting, and autoâ€‘refresh.
frontend/src/components/GroupMembersDial: Dialog listing group members with admin ability to remove users and view their profiles.
frontend/src/components/GroupPostCard.ts: Displays a group post with author info, content, optional image, and a toggleable comments section.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the main site header with navigation, authentication handling, profile menu, notifications, and mobile menu support.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Displays an individual post with image, author info, likes, emoji reactions, comments, and interactive actions.
frontend/src/components/ProfileCustomiza: Modal for selecting a profile background and managing up to five favorite tags, with save callbacks.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Initial profile setup modal allowing users to set a username and bio and save their profile.
frontend/src/constants/emojiReactions.ts: Defines the set of allowed emoji reactions with IDs, symbols, and labels.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication state and actions using Internet Identity, including login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines many React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, admin state, notifications, and various post types via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables plus custom scrollbar styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/CollectionsPage.tsx: Displays collection posts and provides a dialog to create new posts with image uploads and captions.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityPage.tsx: Shows community groups, supports searching, creating, and joining groups, and navigates to group pages.
frontend/src/pages/DiscussionsPage.tsx: Lists discussion posts by topic and includes UI to create new text or image-based discussion posts.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays events with loading skeletons and fallback when none exist.
frontend/src/pages/GroupDetailPage.tsx: Displays group details, posts, and membership actions, allowing users to create posts with optional images and admins/creators to delete the group.
frontend/src/pages/HomeFeed.tsx: Shows the main community feed with hero section, daily prompt, optional post creation, and mood filtering for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/MarketplacePage.tsx: Implements a mock plushie marketplace with listing search and a form to create new listings, currently pending backend integration.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays user notifications grouped by type, with options to mark individual or all notifications as read.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Renders the authenticated user's profile with posts, achievements, customization options, and editable profile details.
frontend/src/pages/ResourcesPage.tsx: Renders a resources page with themed guides displayed as cards using static data and UI components.
frontend/src/utils/backendErrors.ts: Maps backend error messages to simplified, user-friendly text strings.
frontend/src/utils/imagePreprocess.ts: Resizes, compresses, and converts uploaded images into optimized JPEG byte arrays on the client.
frontend/src/utils/imageUpload.ts: Validates image files, generates previews, preprocesses images, and enforces upload size limits.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current state, features, issues, and pending requests related to image upload optimization and reactions.
